name: VILLAGE OF LEMONT, IL
description: Municipality located in Cook, DuPage and Will Counties, IL.
sampleDescriptions: Issues related to U.S. Army Corp infrastructure, technical assistance to states, and flood control projects. Issues related to an at-grade crossing located in the Village.
